price: 37. Seehadayti daacoyti tiffoytay maxaxat caxaanak yekkeh manannaa?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
